ai-patthana14.17:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma ladies that are difficult for the living, etc.,
ai-patthana14.17:0.3_0: Propering the opportunity to get associated with pollutants.
ai-patthana14.17:1.1_0: On the teaching is not for the sake of defilement and associated with the three associated states, and for the sake of a reason. ...
ai-patthana14.17:2.1_0: Or else they don’t associate with pollutants ...
ai-patthana14.17:3.1_0: On the contrary, the Teaching, and the maintained by pollutants, not unfitable. ...” ...
ai-patthana14.17:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
